text: No one has officially said whether Porky belongs to both of them or just to Jonas or Turner. Adopting a dog together is a risky thing — if they split, they face double the heartbreak, since shared custody of pets is pretty hard to pull off. But taking the more romantic view, this move makes us think those two are thinking about settling down together for good.
